languages.text: "Проницательно". {n}Рэндор встречается взглядом с Кибеллой. Воительница не пугает бывшего офицера — напротив, уголок его рта чуть изгибается, и он уважительно кивает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Проницательно". {n}Рэндор Эрэбис встречается взглядом с Кибеллой. Культистка смерти не пугает бывшего офицера — напротив, уголок его рта чуть приподнимается, и он уважительно кивает.{/n}

languages.text: "A keen observation." {n}Randor's eyes meet Kibellah's as she speaks, but he is not intimidated. On the contrary, the corner of his mouth curves upward slightly, and he gives a respectful nod.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Проницательно". {n}Рэндор встречается взглядом с Кибеллой. Воительница не пугает бывшего офицера — напротив, уголок его рта чуть изгибается, и он уважительно кивает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "A sharp observation." {n}Randor's and Kibellah's eyes meet. The warrior doesn't intimidate the former officer. On the contrary, the corner of his mouth curves a little, and he nods respectfully.{/n}

"A keen observation." {n}Randor's eyes meet Kibellah's as she speaks, but he is not intimidated. On the contrary, the corner of his mouth curves upward slightly, and he gives a respectful nod.{/n}

languages.text: « Excellente observation. » {n}Les yeux de Randor rencontrent ceux de Kibellah, mais il ne se laisse pas intimider. Au contraire, il se permet d'esquisser un semblant de sourire tout en lui adressant un signe de tête respectueux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A keen observation." {n}Randor's eyes meet Kibellah's as she speaks, but he is not intimidated. On the contrary, the corner of his mouth curves upward slightly, and he gives a respectful nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Excellente observation. » {n}Les yeux de Randor rencontrent ceux de Kibellah, mais il ne se laisse pas intimider. Au contraire, il se permet d'esquisser un semblant de sourire tout en lui adressant un signe de tête respectueux.{/n}

languages.text: «Una observación astuta». {n}Randor mira a los ojos a Kibellah sin miedo. Al contrario, levanta ligeramente la comisura del labio y asiente en señal de respeto.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A keen observation." {n}Randor's eyes meet Kibellah's as she speaks, but he is not intimidated. On the contrary, the corner of his mouth curves upward slightly, and he gives a respectful nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Una observación astuta». {n}Randor mira a los ojos a Kibellah sin miedo. Al contrario, levanta ligeramente la comisura del labio y asiente en señal de respeto.{/n}

languages.text: 「鋭い観察力だ」{n}そう話すキベラとランドールの視線が交じるが、威圧感はない。それどころか彼は口角をわずかに上げ、尊重するようにうなずいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "A keen observation." {n}Randor's eyes meet Kibellah's as she speaks, but he is not intimidated. On the contrary, the corner of his mouth curves upward slightly, and he gives a respectful nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「鋭い観察力だ」{n}そう話すキベラとランドールの視線が交じるが、威圧感はない。それどころか彼は口角をわずかに上げ、尊重するようにうなずいた。{/n}

languages.text: “你的观察很敏锐。”{n}绮贝菈开了口。兰德尔凝视着绮贝菈的双眼，但并没有被吓到。相反，他的嘴角微微向上弯曲，充满敬意地点了点头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "A keen observation." {n}Randor's eyes meet Kibellah's as she speaks, but he is not intimidated. On the contrary, the corner of his mouth curves upward slightly, and he gives a respectful nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你的观察很敏锐。”{n}绮贝菈开了口。兰德尔凝视着绮贝菈的双眼，但并没有被吓到。相反，他的嘴角微微向上弯曲，充满敬意地点了点头。{/n}

languages.text: "Eine scharfsichtige Beobachtung." {n}Randors Blick trifft auf den von Kibellah, während sie spricht, doch er ist nicht eingeschüchtert. Im Gegenteil, seine Mundwinkel gehen leicht nach oben, und er nickt respektvoll.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A keen observation." {n}Randor's eyes meet Kibellah's as she speaks, but he is not intimidated. On the contrary, the corner of his mouth curves upward slightly, and he gives a respectful nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eine scharfsichtige Beobachtung." {n}Randors Blick trifft auf den von Kibellah, während sie spricht, doch er ist nicht eingeschüchtert. Im Gegenteil, seine Mundwinkel gehen leicht nach oben, und er nickt respektvoll.{/n}

languages.text: "Şahane bir gözlem." {n}Randor, konuşmayı sürdüren Kibellah ile göz göze geliyor. Ancak kendini tehdit altında hissetmiyor. Aksine dudaklarının kenarı hafifçe yukarı kalkıyor ve hürmetle başını eğiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A keen observation." {n}Randor's eyes meet Kibellah's as she speaks, but he is not intimidated. On the contrary, the corner of his mouth curves upward slightly, and he gives a respectful nod.{/n}
